ias_36_impairment_of_assets.reason_of_the_status: Carrying amounts reviewed for impairment when indications exist. No impairment identified or required.

ias_37_provisions_contingent_liabilities.reason_of_the_status: Provisions recognized for WPPF and other liabilities. No contingent liabilities or assets disclosed.

ias_38_intangible_assets.reason_of_the_status: Software recognized as intangible asset and amortized. No other significant intangible assets.

ias_40_investment_property.reason_of_the_status: No investment property held; all property used in production.

ias_41_agriculture.reason_of_the_status: Not an agricultural entity; business is dyeing and winding of sewing thread.

ifrs_9_financial_instruments.reason_of_the_status: Financial assets (receivables, cash) and liabilities (loans, payables) measured at amortized cost. Impairment using expected credit loss model implied.
